intro: Calathea ornata var. roseolineata, commonly known as the Roseolineata Calathea, is a tropical plant native to South America. It is characterized by its striking, variegated foliage with pink and white markings on deep green leaves. The plant belongs to the Marantaceae family and is prized for its ornamental value in indoor gardening. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires consistent moisture and high humidity. Its unique leaf patterns make it a popular choice for adding visual interest to shaded spaces.
